title: Derek Walker (footballer)
text: Derek John Walker (born 3 July 1966) is a Scottish retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who made over 280 appearances in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a>, most notably for <a href="Queen%27s%20Park%20F.C.">Queen's Park</a> and <a href="East%20Stirlingshire%20F.C.">East Stirlingshire</a>.
